abstract.text: The interface for the delegate of a scroll view.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: protocol declares allow the adopting delegate to respond to messages from the
class. The delegate responds to and affects operations like scrolling, zooming, deceleration of scrolled content, and scrolling animations.

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your iOS, iPadOS, or tvOS app.
A view controller that specializes in managing a collection view.
The methods adopted by the object you use to manage user interactions with items in a collection view.
The methods that let you coordinate with a flow layout object to implement a grid-based layout.
A view that allows the scrolling and zooming of its contained views.
The delegate of the scroll view.
A set of methods you can implement to provide accessibility information for a scroll view.
The interface for the delegate of a scroll view.
Tells the delegate when the scroll view’s inset values change.
Tells the delegate that the scroll view ended decelerating the scrolling movement.
Tells the delegate when dragging ended in the scroll view.
Tells the delegate when a scrolling animation in the scroll view concludes.
Tells the delegate when zooming of the content in the scroll view completed.
Tells the delegate when the user scrolls the content view within the scroll view.
Tells the delegate that the scroll view scrolled to the top of the content.
Tells the delegate that the scroll view’s zoom factor changed.
Asks the delegate if the scroll view should scroll to the top of the content.
Tells the delegate that the scroll view is starting to decelerate the scrolling movement.
Tells the delegate when the scroll view is about to start scrolling the content.
Tells the delegate that zooming of the content in the scroll view is about to commence.
Tells the delegate when the user finishes scrolling the content.
Asks the delegate for the view to scale when zooming is about to occur in the scroll view.
A view controller that specializes in managing a table view.
Methods for managing selections, configuring section headers and footers, deleting and reordering cells, and performing other actions in a table view.
The methods for receiving editing-related messages for text view objects.
A view that embeds web content in your app.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.
